articles.title: Arizona Diamondbacks calling up Dallas Keuchel, who will start vs. Detroit Tigers
articles.description: The Diamondbacks are calling up 2015 Cy Young Award winner Dallas Keuchel to start Sunday's game against the Tigers. Keuchel had signed a minor league contract with Arizona earlier this month following his release by the White Sox.
